data.partBlankContent: You can find local soup kitchens and shelters in your phone book. Call th__ and a__ how y__ can he__. Work wi__ the st___ to fi__ a ne__ they ha__ that yo__ group i_ able t_ fill. Then do it!
data.fullContent: You can find local soup kitchens and shelters in your phone book. Call them and ask how you can help. Work with the staff to find a need they have that your group is able to fill. Then do it!
data.answer: 你可以在电话簿里找到当地的施粥所和庇护所。给他们打个电话，问问你能帮上什么忙。与员工一起工作，找到他们的需求，你的团队能够满足。然后做它!
